casebody.data:
STEPHENSON
v.
BARTLETT. No. 94P02-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. Phillip J. Strach, Cary, for Stephenson, et al. *716Tiare B. Smiley, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Bartlett, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of January 2005 by Plaintiff to Allow Direct Appeal and Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
